thread.title: Lamar Odom's condition is improving, family says
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom's condition is improving, family says | Fox News

author: FoxNews.com
title: Lamar Odom's condition is improving, family says
text:
Published October 19, 2015 FoxNews.com Facebook 0 Twitter 0 livefyre Email Print
Lamar Odom's family says his condition is improving after the former NBA star was found unconscious at a Nevada brothel a week ago.
Alvina Alston, publicist for Odom's aunt JaNean Mercer, said Monday that the former reality-TV personality is alert and undergoing testing, but there's no word yet on when he might be released from the hospital.
Mercer said in a statement that Odom is overcoming "insurmountable obstacles" and defying the odds.
The statement says, "Each day Lamar is getting stronger and reaching significant milestones in his recovery."
Odom was found in extremely critical condition at the Love Ranch brothel in Crystal, Nevada, on Oct. 13. The brothel said workers saw him drink alcohol and take supplements sold as "herbal Viagra."
His family, including estranged wife Khloe Kardashian, rushed to Las Vegas to be by his side.
On Saturday, his sister-in-law Kim Kardashian tweeted that he had smiled at her.
I believe in the power of prayer! Thx 4 ur prayers Lammy- So happy Kendall & I could make u smile 2day God is good! pic.twitter.com/T50WNEnmOL
â€” Kim Kardashian West (@KimKardashian) October 18, 2015
Mother-in-law Kris Jenner asked fans to continue to pray for Odom.
Come on Lamar!!!! You are such a champion... I know you got this.... #ourfighter #pleasepray #love #thatsmileiseverything
A photo posted by @krisjenner on Oct 17, 2015 at 9:07pm PDT
The Associated Press contributed to this report.
